appointments.description: SURGICAL LAPAROSCOPY WITH APPENDECTOMY - Right with Physician Surgery, MD in EMH OR on 11/16/2013

full_resource.description: SURGICAL LAPAROSCOPY WITH APPENDECTOMY - Right with Physician Surgery, MD in EMH OR on 11/16/2013
full_resource.patientInstruction:
LAPAROSCOPY APPENDECTOMY
Patient should not eat or drink after midnight prior to day of surgery.  Please arrange travel plans to/from the hospital.  Do not forget to bring any medications you are currently taking.  Please leave any valuables at home or with someone for safekeeping.

appointments.description: APPENDECTOMY with Physician Surgery, MD in EMH OR on 11/13/2013

full_resource.description: APPENDECTOMY with Physician Surgery, MD in EMH OR on 11/13/2013
full_resource.patientInstruction:
APPENDECTOMY OPEN
Here are some basic reminders about your Appendectomy with Dr. Surgery
1. Be sure to not eat after midnight the night before your surgery. Doing so may require that we delay your procedure. If you have questions, be sure to call the nurse at Dr. Surgery's office at (608)271-9000. 
2. Bring all of the medications that you are currently taking or that you have recently taken. Dr. Surgery will make sure that you are prescribed the appropriate medications after your surgery. 
3. It's important to arrange transportation to and from the hospital/clinic. You will not be in a position to drive yourself after the surgery. The nurse will ask for your travel arrangements when you arrive. 
4. Please don't bring any unnecessary valuables with you. Jewelry, MP3 players, watches, cell phones should all be left home if appropriate. 

If you are unable to make your surgery date, please call Dr. Surgery's nurse (608-271-9000) as soon as possible.
